snippet: Energy development groups will be watching closely when the first commercially licensed grid-connected wave-energy device in the nation is launched in October.
abstract: Energy development groups will be watching closely when the first commercially licensed grid-connected wave-energy device in the nation is launched by Ocean Power Technologies in October; success or failure could affect the flow of private investment by larger companies.
lead_paragraph: Energy development groups will be watching closely when the first commercially licensed grid-connected wave-energy device in the nation is launched in October.

headline.seo: Project Aims to Harness Wave Energy Off the Oregon Coast
headline.main: Project Aims to Harness the Power of Waves
headline.print_headline: Project Bids To Harness The Energy Of Waves
